---
title: "Subrace: Amalgamation"
description: ""
---

<img
  src="/images/races/amalgamation.png"
  alt="Amalgamation"
/>

Amalgamations are a type of Death Painting that, while nearly human, still retain parts of their cursed spirit nature.

You gain the following traits.

***Ability Score Increase.*** Your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.

***Partial Spirit Body.*** Traces of your cursed spirit heritage remain. You gain one point to spend on the Body Functions list.

***Almost Human.*** While your form brings you closer to humanity, you still struggle to fully grasp it. You gain proficiency in one Charisma-based skill of your choice.

***Perception of Curses.*** Your connection to both the human and cursed spirit worlds heightens your awareness. You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) and Wisdom (Perception) checks when investigating or detecting cursed spirits.
